title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations              Carillon Clips: Frolic     Guest artist Lisa Lonie plays Frolic from "Music for Twilight" by Frank DellaPenna. This recording was made in August 2012.  Duration:3 minutes, 8 seconds      Download Original File: gwmp-Frolic1.mp33,018 KB                     Carillon Clips: Ode to Joy     Guest artist Lisa Lonie plays the Ode to Joy theme from Beethoven's Symphony No. 9, as arranged by Frank DellaPenna. This recording was made in August 2012.  Duration:4 minutes, 7 seconds      Download Original File: gwmp-Ode-to-Joy1.mp33,966 KB                     Carillon Clips: Twinkle Twinkle, Little Star     Guest artist Lisa Lonie plays "Twinkle Twinkle, Little Star," as arranged by John Courter. This recording was made in August 2012.  Duration:3 minutes, 52 seconds      Download Original File: gwmp-Twinkle-Twinkle-Little-Star.mp33,719 KB                                Planning a Safer Memorial Circle Why is the park working on a transportation plan and environmental assessment for Memorial Circle? Watch this video to find out about the hazards that pedestrians, cyclists, and motorists face. Then visit parkplanning.nps.gov to find out how you can be involved.  Duration:3 minutes, 21 seconds
